room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: I loved being able to have a private party with just my family. It is not as fun playing with strangers.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Thoroughly enjoyed the "Do Not Disturb" room! Very creative clues kept us guessing. Good story line and wonderful staff!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We tried the " Do Not Disturb" room and even though we only got 75% of the way through, the three of us had a great time. I can see where this can be addictive as we are already planning our next visit. A must do as a family, if you get along.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We played Do Not Disturb with 4 people. It was just as fun as the other one we played, Hostage. We called as we were driving there and they were able to assign us into a room at the last minute and didn't have to wait until the top of the hour to start. Very nice to have been able to play at the last minute.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - St. Louis in St. Louis
review: Breakout Games rocks. Weâ€™ve done the Hostage room and just did the newest room, Do Not Disturb. It was a real treat and the staff is always lovely. Easy 5 stars.
